en: Some monsters are actually pretty shy. [pause]I think I can relate.
{player}, have you ever tried being a Traffikrab? [pause]Like [wave amp=30 freq=10]really being[/wave] a Traffikrab?
It's an experience.
Hey there! [pause]Record anything interesting today?
There have been more floods lately.
Sometimes[pause] I just like dashing through the forest!
I picked up a strange sticker the other day.[pause] It doesn't seem to do anything, but my opponent always looks [wave amp=30 freq=10]so annoyed[/wave]!
I still have no idea how I got here.[pause] I'm not sure I want to go back though!
Harbourtown could use some new shops.[pause] Coffee is great[pause], but I'd do anything for a new pair of shoes!
I was battling this ranger the other day[pause] and he transformed into a Khepri and used Headshot like [wave amp=30 freq=15]7 times in a row[/wave]. I didn't even get a turn!
What are we going to do if the Mall runs out of tapes?[pause] I don't even want to think about it!
I was in my bathtub when I suddenly appeared here…[pause] I didn't even get to rinse my hair!
Do you think the monsters here might be…[pause][wave amp=30 freq=15]edible[/wave]?

The most incredible thing washed up on the beach last night…[pause] It was a cartridge of my favorite childhood game![pause] Now if only I could find the [wave amp=30 freq=15]game console[/wave] to use it with...
I heard the mall is haunted![pause] I can't wait to bring a ghost home as a pet!
The other night, I gazed out into the infinite void of the ocean.[pause] It called to me.[pause] It said [wave amp=30 freq=10]"bikini season is only 4 months away"[/wave]![pause] Oh the horror!
There's this rumor[pause], if you play your tapes backwards it would summon a demon god!
I had a brilliant idea![pause] I'm going to use two cassette players to play two different tapes![pause] Do you think I'll fuse with myself?
Cassettes?[pause] I prefer MP3 players myself.
How did I even get here? [pause]Last thing I remember was getting hit by a truck!
I used to be a great ranger like yourself, but then a Nevermort spit on my knee!
There's been another rogue sighting![pause] We need all available rangers!
I'm not sure I can take this one alone! [pause] Can anyone lend a hand?
That rogue is getting out of control! Where are the captains!?
This rogue already killed my partner! [pause] He was just 3 days from retirement too!
I'll help put this rogue down, but don't expect me to hang around if things go south!
We can't let this rogue get too close to town!
Invite {pawn} to Party
Fight {pawn}
[color=#1fba33]Trade Stickers[/color]
Play Card Game
Goodbye!
A card game on a weird interdimensional island filled with dangerous monsters?[pause][pause] Of course I'll play!
Ok[pause], but I'll have you know I'm pretty good at these!
Let's stake our livelyhood and the fate of our world...[pause] on a card game!
Sounds like a great way to take my mind off the impending doom and existential dread!
I spent all night building my deck![pause] Time to take it for a spin!
Aw, dang it. I gotta find better cards.
I knew I should have swapped my stance on the last card!
Next time I'll use more remaster combos!
Argh! Fine[pause], you can have my card!
I'm not going to be a sore loser about it.[pause] Here's your prize.
I'm definitely not going to obsess over this later.
It's all in the heart of the cards, you know?
Shift your stance into Defending when you're low on health! After blocking damage you'll heal for the leftover defense points!
Ha! I've still got it![pause] It's all about Balance!
Did you know?[pause] You keep your Remaster Bonus even if your next card causes you to change stance!
Alright![pause] I'll become a champion in no time!
Playing all the cards for a full remaster gives greater bonuses than partial remasters, but they can be so hard to setup!
Sure, I've got some free time!
I guess I can lend a hand, if you [wave amp=30 freq=10]really[/wave] need it.
We're not doing anything too dangerous[pause], are we?
It seems like you've got your hands full, maybe later!
I'm a bit anxious around this many people. Can we hang out some other time?
Lose the extra pair of hands first.
See you around!
Don't go too far, in case I need help…
Fine, I was in the middle of something anyway.
Sure, I could use the warm up!
Alright, but don't blame me for what happens next.
You'll go easy on me[pause], right?
That was more of a workout than I expected!
I was still getting warmed up.
{player}, you really don't pull your punches do you?
I'm still catching my breath from our last round! Maybe we can go again tomorrow?
Are you [wave amp=30 freq=10]trying[/wave] to humiliate me? Go pick on somebody else for a while.
I don't think I can keep up with you, {player}. I need some time to rethink my strategy!
[i]Dismiss {pawn} from your party?[/i]
Hey {player}, need something?
You and {partner} seem like a great team. I hope I can find somebody like that!
I heard some weird stuff happens here in {region_name}. Maybe we can wrap up and go hang out at the Café?
How long have you been using that {first_tape_name} tape? We should go record one for me to try out!
How's it going?
I'm so pumped! What's next?
Yes
No
Darn, things were just starting to get interesting!
Oh, alright. I'll go work on my sticker collection then.
Done already? Alright, I'll see you around then!
I really need [color=#{request_rarity}][{trade_request}][/color] to complete my newest strategy. I'm willing to offer [color=#{offer_rarity}][{trade_offer}][/color] in exchange!
I've been looking everywhere for [color=#{request_rarity}][{trade_request}][/color]! If you're interested I'll trade [color=#{offer_rarity}][{trade_offer}][/color] for it.
If you've got any spare [color=#{request_rarity}][{trade_request}][/color] stickers laying around, I'll gladly give you my [color=#{offer_rarity}][{trade_offer}][/color] for it.

[color=#{request_rarity}][{trade_request}][/color] is the missing piece to my perfect winning strategy! You can have [color=#{offer_rarity}][{trade_offer}][/color] for it, if you promise not to tell anybody about my amazing setup!
Would you be willing to trade [color=#{request_rarity}][{trade_request}][/color] for my [color=#{offer_rarity}][{trade_offer}][/color] sticker?
Finally, this [color=#{request_rarity}]{trade_request}[/color] sticker will make me invincible!
Thanks! I hope [color=#{offer_rarity}][{trade_offer}][/color] is useful to you!
What a steal! I would have gladly traded [wave amp=30 freq=10]two[/wave] [color=#{offer_rarity}][{trade_offer}][/color] stickers!
What kind of fool do you take me for? That's not [color=#{request_rarity}][{trade_request}][/color]!
If you didn't have [color=#{request_rarity}][{trade_request}][/color] all you had to do was say so…
What am I supposed to do with this? I really needed [color=#{request_rarity}][{trade_request}][/color] to complete my collection!
Sure, here you go!
No way!
Dang it! Now what am I going to do?!
Oh, okay. Thanks for considering it.
I guess I'll have to keep checking the sticker merchants…

NPC Population:
Out To Lunch.
Wait for the Captain to return?
Yes
No
Of course! Sound like fun!
It's a lot of work, but daily patrols are important for the town's safety!
Hi {player}, do anything interesting today?
There's been a lot of new faces washing up on the shore lately.
Let's do everything we can to keep the town safe!
Have you checked the sticker merchants today? They're bound to have some cool stuff you could use!
Right! Let's see how strong you've gotten!
You're so much stronger now!
I need to fix up my tapes first, sorry! Maybe later?
I'd love to find [color=#{request_rarity}][{trade_request}][/color] for my tapes![pause] If you have one, could you trade it to me for this [color=#{offer_rarity}][{trade_offer}][/color] sticker?
Thanks a million! This is exactly what I needed!
That doesn't really look like the sticker I needed…
That sounds fun![pause] Sure, let's play!
That was so fun![pause] You were great![pause] Here's one of my cards to add to your deck!
That was brilliant![pause] I can't wait to play more!
Aw, alright. I'll keep looking then!
I'm gonna need a hand with this one!
See ya!
Arf!
[i]Barkley seems happy to see you![/i]
[i]Barkley is curiously sniffing his cassette player.[/i]
Arf?
[i]Barkley is enjoying the weather in {region_name}.[/i]
[i]There's a glint in Barkley's eye. He's filled with determination![/i]
[i]You happily pet Barkley. He's been a good boy![/i]
Arf Arf!
[i]Barkley is excited to play with you![/i]
[wave amp=30 freq=10]Awoo…[/wave]
[i]He appears too tired for another match.[/i]
Arf! Arf!
[i]His tail wags back and forth with vigor and excitement![/i]
*whine*
Arf?

[i]Barkley paws intently at a [color=#{request_rarity}][{trade_request}][/color] sticker.[pause] He places a [color=#{offer_rarity}][{trade_offer}][/color] sticker at your feet. Is this a trade request?[/i]
Arf Arf!
[i]He wags his tail happily as he attempts to place the sticker on a tape.[pause] It seems he's satisfied with this exchange![/i]
[wave amp=30 freq=10]Grr…[/wave] Arf!
[i]He looks frustrated. Maybe you misunderstood his request?[/i]
Arf?
Arf!
Arf Arf!
[i]He seems dissapointed.[/i]
Arf Arf! [wave amp=30 freq=10]Grr…[/wave]!
Arf!
The dynamic crime fighting…[pause] trio?! This is gonna be wild!
Hey {player}, you out on patrol too?
It's pretty wild out here! There's a ton of new people ready to help out.
I got all these crazy stickers from one of the merchants.[pause] I'm gonna be unstoppable!
I was thinking of trying out a few new battle poses later.[pause] What? Don’t give me that look, it's totally important!
We gotta do more supply runs, can't afford to run low on tapes out there!
I'd gladly show you a few moves[pause], but I gotta finish up here first. Let's hang later!
Lookin' to learn a few tricks from me? You got it!
Dang! You got [wave amp=30 freq=10]way[/wave] better at this!

{player}[pause], buddy. I've [wave amp=30 freq=10]gotta[/wave] have [color=#{request_rarity}][{trade_request}][/color]![pause] I'll give ya this [color=#{offer_rarity}][{trade_offer}][/color] sticker if you got any!
Momentous! Now nothing can slow me down!
Aw man, come on! You know that's what I need!
[wave amp=30 freq=10]Fine[/wave][pause], I get it. I'll just keep battling until I earn one!
Dude![pause] Of course I'm down to play this![pause] I love collectible card games!
Ugh![pause] I was just about to draw my ace![pause] Ah well[pause], I'll get it next time![pause] Here's your reward!
Badass![pause] That was great![pause] Hit me up if you wanna play another round!
See ya!
It's another wild one![pause] I'm taking it down!
Yeah. Sounds like a good time.
Hey there. Not working too hard I hope?
I sketeched this weird monster the other day. Their anatomy was so unorthodox, I couldn't help but get inspired.
I broke another pencil rewinding my tape today[pause]. I always keep a spare[pause], but I usually save it for my sketches.
You know[pause], it's not so bad here![pause] Aside from the wild monsters, it's actually pretty relaxing.
Hey.[pause] I was just enjoying the weather.
Actually, I could use a break. Let's pick this up later.
Sure, I could use the practice.
Wow[pause], you're really something else.
I could use an extra [color=#{request_rarity}][{trade_request}][/color] sticker.[pause] Maybe you'd be willing to trade for my [color=#{offer_rarity}][{trade_offer}][/color] sticker?
Hmm[pause], I don't think that's it.[pause] That's alright, I can probably get it from the merchant stalls.
This should smooth things out for me.[pause] I appreciate it, {player}.
Woah![pause] Check out the artwork on these cards.[pause] Sure, I'll play a round.
Good game.[pause] Here[pause], you can have this.
Rad![pause] That was pretty fun.[pause] Let's play again sometime.
Oh[pause], no worries.[pause] I'm sure I'll find one eventually.
Looks like another rogue on the loose. I can help!
Take care.
Yeah[pause], alright.[pause] I can make time for that.
Uh[pause], hey there.
So.[pause] Is it just me or…[pause] are there more people here than usual?
Hey, {player}.[pause] Did you need something?
Some[pause], uh[pause], odd stuff has been washing up on the beach lately.
Hmm…[pause] I think I'll go record a new tape later.
Urgh. Fine. I'll humor you this one time, mate.
I[pause], uh…[pause] got something I gotta do first, mate.
Alright, fine.[pause] You earned that one.

So[pause], if you've got any [color=#{request_rarity}][{trade_request}][/color] stickers laying around.[pause] I wouldn't mind trading my [color=#{offer_rarity}][{trade_offer}][/color] for it. If you're interested.
Thanks, mate.[pause] I needed this one.
Urgh.[pause] I'm pretty sure I was clear on which bloody sticker I needed.
Yeah[pause], I figured as much.
Uhm.[pause] When did a whole bloody card game wash up on shore?
Well[pause], that was[pause] interesting.[pause] I guess[pause], here's your reward.
Heh[pause], I guess I'm pretty good at this.
Take care, mate.
Not another one![pause] Can somebody just…[pause] urgh! Somebody help me out here!
Splendid![pause] A new adventure awaits us!
I am glad to see you well, friend!
I can see the allure to this new lifestyle.
Another fine day for adventure!
May this day find you well!
Greetings friend!
You mean to test thy mettle against a worthy opponent? I humbly accept your request!
Alas, I fear my current condition would not make our sparring worthwhile. I require a moment of respite.
Pray tell, where did you learn such impressive feats?

If I may, I require one [color=#{request_rarity}][{trade_request}][/color] sticker to improve upon my current ability. If you would be willing to part with one, I offer thee my [color=#{offer_rarity}][{trade_offer}][/color] in exchange!
You have my gratitude!
Alas, dear friend. This does not resemble the item I requested.
Fear not, I am resourceful enough to procure one through other means!
Fare thee well!
A game of chance and skill played on small sheets of paper?[pause] How fascinating!
Marvelous! I do believe it is customary to reward the victor with a card from the defeated's arsenal?
How joyous! I would gladly engage in more of these leisure activities!
Rogues have been sighted upon the horizon! Let us show thy fiends our true mettle!
Oh oh oh! I've played tons of these back home!
Yes! Ha ha! I've still got it!
You were amazing![pause][pause] Ok ok, [wave amp=30 freq=10]Duelist Kingdom[/wave] rules apply so here's one of my cards!
Joining the hero's party?! I'm another step closer to legendary status!
I accept all quests, no matter [wave amp=30 freq=10]how[/wave] small![pause] You never know which one will move the plot forward!
Usually, in this type of Isekai, I would have some unique ability or abnormally high stat![pause] But I feel…[pause][pause] normal?
"In Another World As {frankie_tape}!". It's a pretty catchy title, right?![pause] I might write a fic about it later!
We should write our own theme song![pause][pause] Something catchy like Card Captors![pause]…You had Card Captors on your world[pause], right?
I tried rewinding my tape with my pinkie[pause], but for some reason it still didn't work… [pause]It's like there's some weird [wave amp=30 freq=10]game logic[/wave] that forces me to use pencils!
I've had a lot of time to train [wave amp=30 freq=10]off screen[/wave]![pause] It's time to show off my new special attack![pause][wave amp=30 freq=10] {frankie_attack}![/wave]
I need to finish my training montage first!
Ow…[pause] I think I bit my tongue.

If I could just get my hands on one more [color=#{request_rarity}][{trade_request}][/color] sticker, my PvP build would be [wave amp=30 freq=10]so broken[/wave]! I've got an extra [color=#{offer_rarity}][{trade_offer}][/color] I can trade for it!
Yes! Finally! I'm completely unstoppable now! [pause]You don't know what PvP is do you...?
{player}[pause], I know[pause] that you know[pause] that's not the right sticker…[pause] It's like you're just testing dialog options in a Visual Novel.
Back to the grind then.
See ya!
[wave amp=30 freq=10]Ahhhh!!![/wave] I'm making a big heroic entrance!
Captain, I can't decide between Headshot and Last Rites…
Mourningtown has been trying to get more involved in day to day Ranger activities. [pause]I'm going to keep doing my part!
Training has been so hard lately![pause] I don't know where Frankie gets all that energy from.
I'm going to get stronger! I'll make sure Mourningtown can hold their heads up high again, one day.
Hey Captain! Did you need something?
I'll show you how strong I've become!
I think I sprained something. Let's pick this up again later.
Dang it. I was so sure I had you that time!
[color=#{request_rarity}][{trade_request}][/color] would be a great addition to my arsenal. I can trade you this [color=#{offer_rarity}][{trade_offer}][/color] for it.
Great! I'll be taking down Rogues in half the time with this setup!
That's not it. I'll just get it myself.
Alright, thanks for checking.
See ya around.
I'll put this Rogue down in no time!
I uh..[pause] What?[pause][pause] Alright, I guess I'll play.
Hey, I'm not half bad at this!
You need my help on an important quest?[pause] Of course I can lend you my strength!
Well[pause], I didn't really know what I was doing there.
Hey…
The sun…[pause] It feels…[pause] [wave amp=30 freq=15]Different.[/wave]
I think… [pause]I'll shop for…[pause] new stickers later.
{player}… [pause]How are you…?
…[pause]You've all been…[pause]very accepting…[pause]
I'm stronger…[pause] this time.
I…[pause] I need to rest.
I…[pause] lost.

Can I…[pause] Do you have…[pause] any [color=#{request_rarity}][{trade_request}][/color] stickers... [pause] I could…[pause] trade you my [color=#{offer_rarity}][{trade_offer}][/color] sticker…[pause] if you want.
Thank…[pause]you.
That's…[pause] not it…
Ok…
…[pause]Thanks.
Sure…[pause] That sounds…[pause] fun.
Ha ha…[pause] good game…[pause] Here, take…[pause] this.
I won…[pause]!
Sure…[pause] I'd like that…
I…[pause] think I've got this…[pause]!

I'm not risking my batteries for these [wave amp=30 freq=15]humans[/wave]. I can't just let that rogue run amok either.
That rogue's going to pay for interrupting my sle…[pause]er astral plane business!
Let's wall this one off before it gets a chance to wreck the place!
That rogue is the perfect test for my new mods!
Another wild rogue? [pause]I guess I'll be getting some extra reps in today!
This one's gonna be a wild time! [pause] The whole town's gonna be hearing this!
There won't be any second wind for this rogue! [pause]Time to work!
A perfect chance to sharpen my blades! [pause] This rogue better put up a good fight!
This just in! [pause] Our very own local reporter is just arriving on the scene of another wild rogue battle!
I'll buy some time! [pause]Everyone, make sure you're prepared. That rogue looks dangerous!
Don't let it get near the electric grids! Let's keep this rogue grounded!
This is really cutting into my treasure hunting time! [pause]I hope this rogue has something interesting for me!
